----external tables in staging schema----------------
select top 10 * from stg.AzureDB_Country_Stg -- Azure SQL DB Country table 
select top 10 * from stg.onprem_country_stg -- OnPrem SQL DB Country table 
select top 10 * from stg.azure_dates_stg -- Azure SQL DB dates table 
select top 10 * from stg.cosmos_covidpolicy_stg -- Azure Cosmos DB Policy data 
select top 10 * from dbo.onprem_CovidMetrics_Stg -- OnPrem SQL DB CovidMetrics table 
select top 10 * from stg.AzureDB_CovidMetrics_Stg -- Azure SQL DB CovidMterics table
